name: To think, this land can have centaurs
uniques: 'Outcome'
[+2 Faith] from [Horse] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Faith] from [Grassland] tiles without [Resource] [in all cities]

Comment ['A never seen before land must have centaurs on it!' said the captain. Before he jumps off the ship and swims to the land. I think he might be a little crazy. But our radar doesnt work at all and this landmass seems ridculously big. As such, I have to assume that is the case...After all, why not?]
Destroyed when the city is captured
